rukus.text: Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Fa-Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Qulubuhum Munkiratun Wa Hum Mustakbiruna
La Jarama 'Anna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Yusirruna Wa Ma Yu`linuna 'Innahu La Yuhibbu Al-Mustakbirina
Wa 'Idha Qila Lahum Madha 'Anzala Rabbukum Qalu 'Asatiru Al-'Awwalina
Liyahmilu 'Awzarahum Kamilatan Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wa Min 'Awzari Al-Ladhina YuÄ‘illunahum Bighayri `Ilmin 'Ala Sa'a Ma Yaziruna
